title: Remake because of Bad Internet?
body: when remake comes out in oce, is it possible to remake because you or someone on your team has bad internet?

replies.body: Yes, it's possible. Though, the player with bad internet would have to leave the game for the 90 second requirement, the game would need to have reached the 3-minute mark and there would have to have been no first blood. Basically, your team would need to work together to make it happen, because I doubt your opponents would allow your team to not die to force a remake (pretty much everyone wants that 5v4 advantage).
someone has to be dc'd (left the game) for 90 seconds before the 3 minute mark
